class.name: OpenXRMlMarkerUnderstandingExtension
class.experimental: Marked as experimental due to lack of community validation on Magic Leap devices.

method.name: is_marker_understanding_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if marker understanding is supported; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

signal.name: updating_marker_detectors
signal.description: Emitted on every valid XR frame so that [OpenXRMlMarkerDetector] instances can update their state.
